level.heading: Retail licensee required to post current legal drinking age and notice of requirement to produce valid identification displaying proof of age.
level.text: A retail licensee shall post a notice, maintained in good repair and in a place clearly visible from the point of entry to the establishment, stating:
The minimum age required for the purchases of an alcoholic beverage; and
The obligation of the patron to produce a valid identification document displaying proof of legal drinking age.
